mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reservations SET is_resv = 0 WHERE resv_id = #{resvId}
mapper.select: SELECT r.resv_id, r.member_code, r.acm_id, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.guest_count, r.is_resv, r.pay_id, a.acm_name, a.acm_photo1, a.acm_price as acm_price, p.discount FROM tbl_reservations r JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id LEFT JOIN tbl_pay p ON r.pay_id = p.pay_id WHERE r.member_code = #{memberCode} AND r.check_out >= CURDATE() AND r.is_resv = 1 ORDER BY r.check_in ASC

SELECT r.resv_id, r.member_code, r.acm_id, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.guest_count, r.is_resv, r.created_at, r.pay_id, a.acm_name, a.acm_photo1, a.acm_price as acm_price FROM tbl_reservations r JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id LEFT JOIN tbl_pay p ON r.pay_id = p.pay_id WHERE r.member_code = #{memberCode} AND (r.check_out < CURDATE() OR r.is_resv = 0) ORDER BY r.check_in DESC

SELECT r.resv_id, r.member_code, r.acm_id, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.guest_count, r.is_resv, r.created_at, r.pay_id, a.acm_name, a.acm_photo1, a.acm_price as acm_price, p.discount FROM tbl_reservations r JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id LEFT JOIN tbl_pay p ON r.pay_id = p.pay_id WHERE r.member_code = #{memberCode} AND r.check_in > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) AND r.is_resv = 1 ORDER BY r.check_in ASC

SELECT r.resv_id, r.member_code, r.acm_id, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.guest_count, r.is_resv, r.created_at, r.pay_id, a.acm_name, a.acm_photo1, a.acm_price as acm_price, p.discount FROM tbl_reservations r JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id JOIN tbl_pay p ON r.pay_id = p.pay_id WHERE p.pay_id = #{payId}

SELECT r.resv_id, r.acm_id, r.member_code, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.guest_count, r.is_resv, r.created_at, r.pay_id, a.acm_name, a.acm_price as acm_price, a.acm_photo1 FROM tbl_reservations r JOIN tbl_acm a ON r.acm_id = a.acm_id LEFT JOIN tbl_pay p ON r.pay_id = p.pay_id WHERE r.acm_id = #{acmId} AND r.is_resv = 1 ORDER BY r.check_in ASC
